name: Erik ten Hag
bio: Erik ten Hag is the head coach of Manchester United, known for his tactical prowess and team building skills.

name: Marcus Rashford
bio: Marcus Rashford emerged from Manchester United's youth academy, showcasing exceptional talent as a forward. With his rapid pace and keen eye for goal, Rashford quickly became a fan favorite. Off the pitch, Rashford is known for his philanthropic efforts, especially in combating child food poverty, which has earned him national acclaim and respect beyond football.

name: Rasmus Winther-Hojlund
bio: Rasmus Winther-Hojlund is recognized for his agility and tactical intelligence on the field. He began his career in Denmark, showing great potential and a natural flair for goal-scoring.

name: Jadon Sancho
bio: Jadon Sancho's career began at Watford before moving to Manchester City's youth team and then breaking through at Borussia Dortmund. His dribbling skills and creative flair on the wing have made him one of Europe's most exciting young talents. Sancho's return to Manchester United marked a homecoming for a player many hope will be pivotal in the team's quest for glory.

name: Shola Shoretire
bio: A product of United's youth system, Shola Shoretire has made headlines for his versatility across the front line. His ability to play in multiple attacking positions, coupled with his composed demeanor on the ball, earmarks him as a one-to-watch for the future. Shoretire is also notable for setting age-related records in both domestic and European competitions.

name: Alejandro Garnacho
bio: Alejandro Garnacho is a young talent with a penchant for incisive runs and a powerful shot. As a youth international, he has already turned heads with performances for both club and country. His dedication to improving his game is evident in his extra training sessions and his determination on the pitch.

name: Anthony Martial
bio: Anthony Martial's transfer to Manchester United set expectations high due to his natural ability and early comparisons to football legends. Martial's time at United has seen him develop into a forward known for his dribbling, composure, and finishing. Despite facing competition for his place, Martial's ability to change a game single-handedly remains undisputed.

name: Antony Matheus dos Santos
bio: Commonly known as Antony, this Brazilian winger is celebrated for his flair, technical skills, and ability to produce moments of magic on the field. Antony's career in Europe began with Ajax, where he developed a reputation for his 1v1 prowess and goal contributions, earning him a high-profile move to one of the world's most storied clubs.

name: Sofyan Amrabat
bio: Sofyan Amrabat is valued for his defensive contributions and playmaking from midfield.

name: Scott McTominay
bio: Scott McTominay is known for his physical presence and versatility in midfield.

name: Bruno Fernandes
bio: Bruno Fernandes is renowned for his creativity, goal-scoring, and leadership in midfield.

name: Hannibal Mejbri
bio: Hannibal Mejbri is noted for his technical skill and vision.

name: Mason Mount
bio: Mason Mount is celebrated for his passing accuracy and tactical intelligence.

name: Donny van de Beek
bio: Donny van de Beek offers versatility and a keen eye for goal from midfield.

name: Facundo Pellistri
bio: Facundo Pellistri is known for his pace and dribbling ability on the wing.

name: Christian Eriksen
bio: Christian Eriksen is a playmaker known for his vision and precision passing.

name: Kobbie Mainoo
bio: Kobbie Mainoo is a dynamic player with potential for great future contributions.

name: Casemiro
bio: Casemiro is recognized as a powerful defensive midfielder with strong tackling skills.

name: Luke Shaw
bio: Luke Shaw is a left-back known for his crossing ability and defensive solidity.

name: Diogo Dalot
bio: Diogo Dalot offers versatility and is capable of playing both right-back and left-back.

bio: Jersey number 2, Victor Lindelöf is a center-back recognized for his calmness and ball-playing ability.
